title: Making a Table Reservation
desc: Practice how to request a table for a specific number of people at a restaurant.
prompt_en: You want to reserve a table for four people at a restaurant. How would you ask the waiter politely?
prompt_zh: 你想在餐廳預訂一張四人桌。你會如何禮貌地向服務員提出要求？
sample_questions: Can I have a table for four, please?
Do you have a table available for four people?
I'd like to book a table for four.

title: Ordering Drinks
desc: Learn how to order drinks politely in a restaurant setting.
prompt_en: You are at a restaurant and want to order drinks. How do you tell the waiter your drink choices?
prompt_zh: 你在餐廳想點飲料。你會如何告訴服務員你的飲料選擇？
sample_questions: Can I have a lemonade, please?
I'd like an orange juice.
Just water for me, thanks.

title: Ordering Food and Starters
desc: Practice ordering main courses and starters at a restaurant.
prompt_en: You are ready to order your meal. How do you tell the waiter your starter and main course choices?
prompt_zh: 你準備點餐了。你會如何告訴服務員你的前菜和主菜選擇？
sample_questions: I'd like the vegetable soup as a starter.
For the main course, I'll have the grilled chicken.
Can I have the lasagna and a salad, please?

title: Expressing Opinions About Food
desc: Learn how to express your opinion about the taste of food in a restaurant.
prompt_en: You want to tell your dining companions how the food tastes. How do you express that you like or dislike the food?
prompt_zh: 你想告訴同桌的人你對食物的味道感受。你會如何表達喜歡或不喜歡食物？
sample_questions: The grilled chicken tastes delicious.
I love the lasagna; it's my favorite dish.
The soup is too hot to eat right now.

title: Asking for Items at the Table
desc: Practice how to ask for items like salt or water during a meal.
prompt_en: You need something at the table, like salt or water. How do you ask politely?
prompt_zh: 你在用餐時需要桌上的物品，如鹽或水。你會如何禮貌地提出要求？
sample_questions: Could you please pass me the salt?
Can I have a glass of water, please?
Would you bring me some water?

title: Ordering Dessert
desc: Learn how to order desserts after the main meal in a restaurant.
prompt_en: You want to order dessert after your meal. How do you tell the waiter your dessert choice?
prompt_zh: 你想在主餐後點甜點。你會如何告訴服務員你的甜點選擇？
sample_questions: I'd like some ice cream for dessert.
Can I have the chocolate cake, please?
I'll have the cheesecake.

title: Asking for the Bill
desc: Practice how to ask for the bill politely when you are ready to pay.
prompt_en: You have finished your meal and want to pay. How do you ask the waiter for the bill?
prompt_zh: 你已經吃完飯，想要付錢。你會如何禮貌地向服務員要帳單？
sample_questions: Could we have the bill, please?
Can you bring me the check?
I'd like to pay now, please.

title: Ordering Fast Food
desc: Learn how to order fast food items and specify preferences like 'for here' or 'to go'.
prompt_en: You want to order fast food like a hamburger and fries. How do you place your order and specify if you want to eat there or take away?
prompt_zh: 你想點漢堡和薯條等速食。你會如何下訂單並說明是在店內用餐還是外帶？
sample_questions: I'll have a hamburger, french fries, and a coke for here.
Can I get a double cheeseburger with fries to go?
No onions on my cheeseburger, please.

title: Discussing Food Preferences
desc: Practice talking about your food taste preferences and how often you eat certain types of food.
prompt_en: You want to share your food preferences and how often you eat fast food. How do you express this in conversation?
prompt_zh: 你想分享你的食物偏好以及你吃速食的頻率。你會如何在對話中表達？
sample_questions: I like spicy and salty food.
I eat fast food about three times a week.
My favorite food is taco, but I also love fried chicken sandwiches.
